Key Match Events: South Africa defended a lowly total of 113-6 and restricted Bangladesh to 109-7.
Keshav Maharaj bowled a six-run, two-wicket final over.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played on a typically tough batting pitch at Nassau County Stadium.
Others: South Africa firmed top spot in Group D with a third win and was in pole position to secure a Super Eight spot. Bangladesh's first loss in two matches kept it in second place.
